Karl & Ann Johnson have been designing and installing closets in Michigan since 1997. Paul and Carla St. Vincent bring you more than twenty years of experience in custom woodworking and specialty cabinetry. You will LOVE your new closets!

Custom Closets and Organizers

Sturdy Themes

Our Closet Organizing Systems come in nine colors. You can choose from White, Bisque, Modern Cherry, Chocolate Pear and Century Gray. Or select one of four colors with texture: Driftwood Live, Cypress Live, Midnight Live and Snowdrift.

Up to Date

Our closet designs feature shelves and rods that are adjustable and washable. You may add shoe cubbies, shoe shelves, drawers, baskets, tie racks, belt racks, "next day rods," island units and more.

Experience

We specialize in CLOSETS: Master Walk In Closets, Bedroom Closets,

Linen Closets,

Front Coat Closets,

Rear Coat Closets,

Mudrooms, Bonus Rooms, Office Closets and PANTRIES!

Made with Love

We can help you with challenging closets like bonus rooms that have sloped walls, or closets with angled walls. We often turn bedrooms into walk in closets.

Quality

All materials have a 10 year warranty. Your closet systems will look new in 10 years. Drawers come in 12 sizes and have full extension, ball bearing, soft close glides.
